properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:42PM PST until February 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...MORE MOUNTAIN SNOW THIS WEEKEND...

.A moist Pacific storm system will spread accumulating snow
Saturday and into Sunday across the higher terrain of southeast
Washington and north Idaho.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 9
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Anatone, Peola, Mountain Road, and Cloverland Road.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY
